titles.title: Social Security Integrity Act of 2015
To direct the Commissioner of Social Security to implement certain record keeping recommendations, and for other purposes.
Social Security Integrity Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary:
Social Security Integrity Act of 2015
This bill directs the Commissioner of Social Security to implement all of the recommendations described in the memorandum from the Office of the Inspector General of the Social Security Administration entitled "Numberholders Age 112 or Older Who Did Not Have a Death Entry on the Numident (A-06-14-34030)" and dated March 4, 2015.
